ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a RIT Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'RIT'), ISPICKVAL( NS_Type__c ,'Device Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , RecordType.Name!='NS Internal', NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, OR( ISBLANK( NS_ExternalCaseNotes__c ), ISBLANK( NS_DeviceName__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Case Resolution (External), Device Name prior to closing the Case.
